title: Textile, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: warp and weft resist (ikat) on handwoven plain weave
description: Alternating warp stripes of light blue and white intersect with blue and white weft stripes to form a large scale plaid pattern with both solid color and ikat stripes.

Textile, early 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: warp and weft resist (ikat) on handwoven plain weave. 1960-86-1.
